books.title: Jaws
books.author: Peter Benchley
books.aboutAuthor: Peter Benchley was an American author, screenwriter, and ocean activist. He is known for the bestselling novel Jaws and co-wrote its subsequent film adaptation with Carl Gottlieb. Several more of his works were also adapted for cinema, including The Deep, The Island, Beast, and White Shark.

books.title: Nothing Else But Miracles
books.author: Kate Albus
books.aboutAuthor: Kate Albus is a writer and poet. She is the author of the young adult novel A Place to Hang the Moon and the poetry collection A Lightness, A Thirst, or Nothing at All. Her work has appeared in various literary journals and anthologies, including Best New Poets 2017, Crazyhorse, and The Cincinnati Review.

books.title: The méthamorphosis
books.author: Franz Kafka
books.aboutAuthor: Franz Kafka was a German-speaking Bohemian writer of novels and short stories, regarded by critics as one of the most significant writers of the 20th century. His work, which fuses elements of realism and the fantastic, typically features isolated protagonists facing bizarre or surrealistic predicaments and incomprehensible socio-bureaucratic powers.

books.title: Sleep in a Sea of Stars
books.author: Christopher Paolini
books.aboutAuthor: Christopher Paolini is an American author. He is best known for The Inheritance Cycle, which consists of the books Eragon, Eldest, Brisingr, and Inheritance. He lives in Paradise Valley, Montana, where he wrote his first book.

books.title: Oz
books.author: L. Frank Baum
books.aboutAuthor: Lyman Frank Baum was an American author chiefly famous for his children's books, particularly The Wonderful Wizard of Oz and its sequels. He wrote 14 novels in the Oz series, plus 41 other novels, 83 short stories, over 200 poems, and at least 42 scripts. He made numerous attempts to bring his works to the stage and the nascent medium of film; the 1939 adaptation of the first Oz book would become a landmark of 20th-century cinema.

books.title: Think and Grow Rich
books.author: Napoleon Hill
books.aboutAuthor: Napoleon Hill was an American self-help author. He is well known for his book Think and Grow Rich which is among the top 10 best selling self-help books of all time. Hill's works insisted that fervid expectations are essential to improving one's life. Most of his books were promoted as expounding principles to achieve 'success'.

books.title: The Sum of All Things
books.author: Ray Nayler
books.aboutAuthor: Ray Nayler is a science fiction writer. He is the author of the novel The Unfinished Land and the short story collection Pas de Deux. His short fiction has appeared in Asimov's Science Fiction, The Magazine of Fantasy & Science Fiction, and elsewhere.
